study_plan_entry.title: Three-dimensional reconstruction of biological macromolecules from electron microscope images

free_text.Learning outcomes: To develop skills necessary to reconstruct the three-dimensional structure of a biological specimen imaged using an electron microscope[br/]
free_text.Content: Overview of an electron microscope[br/]Overview of specimen preparation techniques[br/]Image formation in an electron microscope: Contract transfer function[br/]Data collection techniques[br/]Single particle and tomographic data processing[br/]Symmetry, averaging and classification[br/]Overview of three-dimensional reconstruction algorithms[br/]Interpretation of three-dimensional EM reconstructions[br/]
free_text.Keywords: Cryo-electron microscopy, three-dimensional image reconstruction, electron microscope, image processing[br/]
free_text.Note: Desirable prior knowledge: Unix command line[br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Bachelor level physics, Good programming skills[br/]

en.title: Three-dimensional reconstruction of biological macromolecules from electron microscope images

fr.title: Three-dimensional reconstruction of biological macromolecules from electron microscope images
